message.raw:
Fix an issue with making calls to add_text asynchronous. Whilst that change was
necessary to ensure printing large amounts of text from the mainloop doesn't
deadlock, it means that shutdown() no longer guarantees that future queued
inmain calls to add_text will not run, and any such calls may crash since qt
widgets may have been destroyed.

This commit fixes the issue by having shutdown() call add_text sychronously
until there is no more queued text remaining. Future calls to add_text see that
there is nothing left to do and return without touching Qt objects.
